biography.value: The Sentient Echo Ooze is a dreadful remnant of a world long lost to chaos, swept into Wordal by a violent Planar Conjunction. On their home plane, these oozes were used as vessels for collective memory, absorbing the thoughts and dreams of a once-great civilization to preserve its legacy. But something went wrong: the flood of consciousness warped the oozes, granting them uncanny intelligence and a yearning for new minds and identities. Now, in the realm of Wordal, Sentient Echo Oozes haunt the places where the fabric between worlds runs thin. They roam in search of sentient creatures, drawn by the psychic resonance of living thoughts.

description.value: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three Pseudopod attacks. It can replace one attack with Slime Spray, if available.

Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 17 (4d6 + 3) acid damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 10 (3d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns.

A sticky, powerful tentacle whips outward, gripping and burning its prey.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] expels a caustic torrent in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. Creatures that fail are also dragged up to 40 feet straight toward the ooze.

A surge of toxic, glowing ooze erupts outward, burning and pulling victims closer.
Amorphous. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
Spider Climb. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]]Â is subjected to acid damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the acid damage dealt.

Echo Infestation (Recharge 6). One creature within 10 feet must succeed on a DC 18 Charisma saving throw or become Infested. While infested, the ooze merges with the host, taking complete control. The ooze uses the hostâs physical stats, proficiencies, class features, resistances, and immunities. The host is aware but unable to control their body. The infestation ends if the host drops to 0 hit points or a dispel evil and good, greater restoration, or wish spell is cast, or if the ooze ends it as a bonus action. When it ends, the ooze reforms in an adjacent space. The target is immune to this ability for 24 hours after saving or after the effect ends.

The ooze surges into its victimâs mouth and nostrils, rapidly dissolving into their body as its own will takes hold.

Each creature within 60 feet that can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. While frightened, creatures see agonized faces and flashes of pain within the oozeâs body. Creatures affected can repeat the save at the end of their turns, ending the effect on a success. Immune for 24 hours after a successful save or after the effect ends.

The oozeâs surface ripples with distorted, tormented faces and flickering memories, flooding your mind with visions of loss and fear that arenât your own.
